title: How to Eliminate Grey Hair (Sage or Rosemary Method)

steps.title: Make a brew of sage or sage and rosemary.
steps.content: Make a brew of sage or sage and rosemary. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Take one cup of sage or 2/3 sage and 1/3 rosemary and add 3 cups of boiling water.
steps.content: Take one cup of sage or 2/3 sage and 1/3 rosemary and add 3 cups of boiling water. Simmer for 15-20 minutes gently. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Let it cool.
steps.content: Let it cool. Add 2 teaspoons of apple cider vinegar. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Put it in a glass bottle (not plastic).
steps.content: Put it in a glass bottle (not plastic).

steps.title: Rub or spray a little on your hair 4-5 times a week and let it dry or use as a rinse after washing.
steps.content: Rub or spray a little on your hair 4-5 times a week and let it dry or use as a rinse after washing.
